name: catachresis
text:
How is this strip not a five
Best concept of a guitar pedal ever, combined with Ray's ever-present love of buying things he has no hope of understanding

name: saint
text: A comment left by saint was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by NeoNaoNeo, Rygaud, Ariamaki, rowboat, antecen, farqussus, NDCaesar, Lumus, yingkaixing)

name: ferdinand
text: NOT. WORTH. THE. EFFORT.

name: saint
text: A comment left by saint was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by farqussus, Lumus, mediumrare, yingkaixing)

name: rowboat
text: But still you listen.

text: A comment left by saint was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by phthoggos, glorify, trisha, amandulence, Lumus, nipsy43, empy, Epicurus, yingkaixing)

name: madnes
text: Way to weep the weepy-weep way.

name: saint
text: A comment left by saint was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by phthoggos, rowboat, Lumus, empy, Epicurus, yingkaixing)

name: saint
text:
SUNNUVAWHORE.
BBCODE CAN SUCK A GIANT DICK

name: soticoto
text: BBCode can suck my dick .

name: gormster
text: Man, BBCode can do anything.

name: soticoto
text: Could BBCode rip a dude's face off with his bare hands?

name: ealtdharkon
text:
I've seen it kill a man, whilst keeping him alive, so he'd live through it.

Remember that next time you're chuggin' your member with BBCode, remember to treat it right.

name: canusdivinus
text:
I...
It...
OH SHI-

name: vheissu
text: I heard BBCode doesn't listen to music!

name: atticusonline
text: A comment left by atticusonline was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by apocowarg, ummerr, fakead, redion, TonyHighwind, Kelly, Satyr)

name: saint
text:
Can you fathom how dumb this is?
I can.
I'm doing it right now.

name: tragicone
text:
Where was the pole?

Did I place?

name: rowboat
text: In a surprise twist, you were actually voted most interesting poster not only on assetbar, but on the entire internet. Don't let it go to your head.

name: tragicone
text:
I'll try.

But you guys have to refer to me as the internet king, forthright.

name: farqussus
text: I for one welcome our new internet overlord. Hail King  Tragicone.

name: rowboat
text: Collaborator.

name: farqussus
text: the pole is in my pants

name: puguglypress
text: I've got a backup, I'm keeping it in your mom

name: dissembly
text: Dammit, why do i have NO LAMES AT ALL?

name: mikeronomicon
text: You get a chubby for that fine comment sir. Fuck Linkin Park.

name: stormagnet
text: I think there'd be more of a market for an effects pedal that generates a five-pack-a-day smoker's voice. Especially for Blues.

name: dusty
text: It reminds me more of when a little kid has a total freakout, like if they're at chuck-e-cheese's and they've been crying and screaming so much that they have snot all over their face. Just picture such a kid going "all I want to do is be more like me and be less like you" it's the same voice.

name: deusoma
text: The answer to your question is "Not everyone agrees with your opinion of this strip."

name: katal
text: OH BABY I AIN'T GOT NO MONEY OH HONEY NOW MONEY DON'T COME LOOKING FOR YOU has been one of my away messages on AIM ever since 2/13/2004.

name: biddlebubbly
text: Come on now, man has effects pedals designed by NASA and his amp is a meager 60 watts?

name: jstegall
text: Man, that's just Ray's practice amp.

name: anzio
text: If it's a tube amp, 60 watts is MORE than enough power.

name: centipede_damascus
text: BABY SOMETIMES I AM SAD becomes OH BABY THE NIGHTS ARE LONG WITHOUT YOU

name: spinynorman
text:
NIGHT'S TOO QUIET
STRETCHED OUT ALONE
I NEED THE WHIP OF THUNDER, AND THE WIND'S DARK MOAN!

name: epicurus
text: Thanks to this strip my friends think I am insane when i will randomly sing "OH BABY I AIN'T GOT NO MONEY" then pause and "accompany" myself with the reply.

name: epicurus
text: I guess I am secretly hoping that one of them will read this and one day do the second part after I do the first.

name: hollis
text: A true friend will do this.

name: zapatos
text: A true friend will give you a money.

name: kelsotimebomb
text: I secretly hope that one day I'll be singing that quietly to myself, when out of nowhere a strange person will sing the reply.  That's how we'll know we're soulmates or something.

name: epicurus
text: Dude hate to break it to you but it's just gonna be me.

name: greenkoolayd
text: you wouldnt be the worst person to have as a soul mate.

name: thegrayhoodie
text: I said this the other night at a party whilst strumming a bluesy riff and my brother backed me up out of nowhere.  we're thinking of recording it, adding our own lyrics of course, I'll keep you guys posted.

name: rotating-dog
text: I wonder if they call these "Johnson pedals"

name: electricjelly
text: The funny thing is: while reading this strip, I am listening to a Robert Johnson album (because of Achewood, too, yes) and it fits SO PERFECT

name: nuisancevalue
text: You too?

name: closefriend
text: So THIS is how Ringo has been singing "With a Little Help From My Friends"...

name: tekende
text: Huge slam on Ringo Starr from out of nowhere.

name: riazm
text:
PFSC high five Tekende.

Now on the side.

Now down low.

name: landowmpg
text: stay in school, children, what else are you gonna do

name: soticoto
text:
You suppose Ray's Rickenbacker has an inbuilt vodka-flask for those needy moments while rockin out?

... He doesn't take me as the sort to have it doublin as a fully-automatic, Haruko-style.

name: baldran
text: Different kind of Ric.

name: sweetlips
text: Man, John Lennon must have been a lot smaller than the pictures show him to be. No wonder he was such a Jealous Guy.

name: random_shorts
text: ...because the guitar is the correct size for the cat, and not John Lennon unless John Lennon was a tiny man.

name: tonyhighwind
text:
I think I'm the only one confused here, but are we sure the thing's actually responding to Ray? Are we sure it's not translating what he said, something anyone with a passing knowledge of the Blues could come up with, into something a man who has been Steeped in the stuff would truly say?

Either way, this rocks.

name: zem
text: i agree, it's turning ray's line into something else, not following up on it, which wouldn't make any since. everyone saying otherwise is a fool

name: zem
text: any sense. wow

name: taiga81
text: except that it says that it accompanies Delta bluesmen
